item.title: Has Can Fin Homes declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Can Fin Homes Ltd. has declared a dividend of 350%, amounting to ₹6 per share, with an ex-date of July 11, 2025. The company has shown strong total returns across various periods, with a total return of 18.62% over the last 3 months. Time: 24 minutes ago

item.title: Fredun Pharma Joins MomentumNow Stocks on Strong Quarterly Financials
item.description: Fredun Pharma, a micro-cap player in the Pharmaceuticals & Biotechnology sector, has been added to the MomentumNow Stocks list as of 16 December 2025, reflecting notable financial performance in the September quarter. The company’s recent quarterly results reveal significant growth across key metrics, positioning it as a noteworthy contender in the current market momentum landscape. Time: 4 hours ago

item.title: DCM Shriram Industries Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: Shares of DCM Shriram Industries have recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development often signals a shift towards a bearish trend, reflecting potential long-term weakness in the stock’s price momentum. Time: 5 hours ago
